changes.comment: Add `emitModulePackageJson` option for `additionalModuleKindsToEmit` entries. When enabled, a `package.json` with the appropriate `"type"` field (`"module"` for ESNext/ES2015 or `"commonjs"` for CommonJS) is written to the output folder after compilation. This ensures Node.js correctly interprets `.js` files in the output folder, fixing ESM import failures on Node 18.
